description:
Aguri and Keita discover Chiaki and Tasuku on what appears to be a date. Aguri is devastated, but both she and Tasuku decide independently to help Keita move things along with Karen.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Karen Tendo and Surprise "Happy End" (Gamers and Wipeout "Game Over")
Les gamers et le game over total
Tendou Karen to Fuiuchi Happy End (Gamers to Zenmetsu Game Over)
天道花憐と不意打ちハッピーエンド (ゲーマーズと全滅ゲームオーバー)
